Sneak Hit.name: Sneak Hit
Sneak Hit.description: 9/10 chance to reduce opponent's current HP by 1/2, 1/10 chance to instantly kill

Thunder.name: Thunder
Thunder.description: Reduces opponent's HP by half with a chance to destroy equipment

Soul Fire.name: Soul Fire
Soul Fire.description: Boosts Attack by 50% each turn after use

Prayer.name: Prayer
Prayer.description: Heals 50% of total HP and cures some status ailments

Virus.name: Virus
Virus.description: 3/4 chance to reduce opponent's AT, DF, MG, and SP by 25%

Sing.name: Sing
Sing.description: 3/4 chance to confuse the opponent for 1~3 turns

Glory.name: Glory
Glory.description: Forces opponent surrender; works on adventurers and can earn bounty rewards

Will Bind.name: Will Bind
Will Bind.description: Seals opponent's Counter and Give Up commands temporarily

Afterburn.name: Afterburn
Afterburn.description: Boosts all stats by 50% but halves user's HP afterward

Restrict.name: Restrict
Restrict.description: 50% chance to seal a random battle command temporarily

Power Poke.name: Power Poke
Power Poke.description: High chance to reduce HP by 25% or instant kill

Charge.name: Charge
Charge.description: Increases Attack 50% until physical attack used; stackable

Chakra.name: Chakra
Chakra.description: Boosts Attack and Magic by 50% for battle

Overlord.name: Overlord
Overlord.description: 50% chance to triple or halve Attack

Escape.name: Escape
Escape.description: Exit battle with invincibility until next encounter

Steal.name: Steal
Steal.description: 25% chance to take random item from opponent

Rob.name: Rob
Rob.description: 50% chance to steal all gold, items, and field magic

Transform.name: Transform
Transform.description: Become opponent, copying stats and abilities

Meditate.name: Meditate
Meditate.description: Boosts Magic 50% until magical attack used; stackable

????.description: Becomes a random adventurer skill each battle
